Scene:
The Haori Falls Off
(Haori Otoshi / 羽織落し)

Play: The Courier for Hell (冥途の飛脚)

Production: October 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)
